products.title: Splash Dove Grey Panel Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash dove grey panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The light grey panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm, saturated shade. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design.

products.title: Splash Smoke Blue Panel Blind
products.description: Their splash smoke blue panel blinds are a quick and stylish way to fill a space. This saturated, medium blue dim-out fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.

products.title: Splash Cream Panel Blind
products.description: Splash cream panel blinds are a fabulous way to dress your window. The light cream fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. At swift direct blinds, like all their made to measure products, these panel blinds are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.
